data.1: READ IN THE name of your Lord who created,
data.3: Read, for your Lord is most beneficent,
data.5: Taught man what he did not know.
data.6: And yet, but yet man is rebellious,
data.7: For he thinks he is sufficient in himself.
data.8: Surely your returning is to your Lord.
data.9: Have you seen him who restrains
data.10: A votary when he turns to his devotions?
data.11: Have you thought, if he had been on guidance
data.12: Or had enjoined piety, (it would have been better)?
data.13: Have you thought that if he denies and turns away,
data.14: Does he not know that God sees?
data.15: And yet indeed if he does not desist We shall drag him by the forelock,
data.16: By the lying, the sinful forelock.
data.17: So let him call his associates,
data.18: We shall call the guards of Hell.
data.19: Beware! Do not obey him, but bow in adoration and draw near (to your Lord).
